text:
The HttpServletResponseWrapperSetStatusMsgTest fails when using
mod_jk and Apache-1.3.
Watchdog excepts:
HTTP/1.1 200 in HttpServletResponseWrapperSetStatusMsgTest servlet
But mod_jk only returns:
HTTP/1.1 200
creator: jfclere@gmail.com

text: What about when using with TC 3.3.1 ?
creator: hgomez@apache.org

text:
This component is now deprecated. If you still experience this issue, please 
upgrade to the Coyote JK2 connector.

No further work will take place against this bug report.
creator: markt@apache.org
